channel.title: CVE Feed for gopkg.in/yaml.v2 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gopkg.in/yaml.v2 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4235|2024-08-03T17:23:09.096Z -- gopkg.in%2Fyaml.v2 -- gopkg.in%2Fyaml.v2
item.description: Due to unbounded alias chasing, a maliciously crafted YAML file can cause the system to consume significant system resources. If parsing user input, this may be used as a denial of service vector.

item.title: CVE-2022-3064|2024-08-03T01:00:10.262Z -- gopkg.in%2Fyaml.v2 -- gopkg.in%2Fyaml.v2
item.description: Parsing malicious or large YAML documents can consume excessive amounts of CPU or memory.
